Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Rectangle

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    Class shape used to create a shape object.
    Author:
    Jared Madden

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shape()
      Additional shape constructor with origin point (0.0, 0.0)
      Shape(double x, double y)
      Shape constructor with 2 origin doubles

      Method to move the origin point.

    • Method Detail

      • setOrigin

        public void setOrigin(double x,
                      double y)
        setOrigin method to change the value of the origin point.
        Parameters:
        x - the new x value for the origin.
        y - the new y value for the origin.

      • getOrigin

        public Point getOrigin()
        Method to return the origin point of the shape object.

      • moveOrigin

        public void moveOrigin(double deltaX,
                       double deltaY)
        Method to move the origin point.
        Parameters:
        deltaX - the X value added to the origin x value.
        deltaY - the Y value added to the origin y value.

      • distanceShape

        public double distanceShape(Point p)
        Method to compute the distance between 2 shape objects.
        Parameters:
        p - the origin point to compare the distance between it and this shape.
        Returns:
        the calculated distance between the points.
